Interface ICacheStoreMethods
 
Packagecom.mccannsf.util.cache
Interfacepublic interface ICacheStore
ImplementorsCache

The ICacheStore interface creates the contract for objects that implement a CacheStore pattern.

See also

com.mccannsf.util.cache.Cache

Method detail
cacheObject()method
public function cacheObject(key:*, item:int, purgeTimeout:Boolean = -1, overwrite:* = false):void

Cache an object.

Parameters
key:* — The key to store the object as.
 
item:int — The time in milliseconds before the item should be cache. Use -1 to never expire.
 
purgeTimeout:Boolean (default = -1) — Overwrite the previously cached object by stored.
 
overwrite:* (default = false)
